en-US.name: Ironman Pack
en-US.summary: The Ironman pack is a great addition because you will hear facts about Ironman.
en-US.description: The Ironman pack expands the set of facts shared with you to include facts about Ironman.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The Ironman pack adds over 10 Ironman facts into the set of facts randomly chosen to be shared with you.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the Ironman pack.  You now have access to Ironman facts!
